direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the inner HTML of elements by adding HTML content, but at different positions (start vs. end).
Both methods insert HTML content relative to the element, but prepend inserts inside the element while before inserts outside.
Both methods set the HTML content of elements, but prepend adds to the existing content while html replaces it.
Both methods involve modifying the structure of elements by adding HTML content, but wrap surrounds the element while prepend inserts inside at the start.
The selectFirst method can be used to find elements that prepend might modify, indicating a dependency on element selection.
